NewsItem.HEADLINE: Expert Insight for RAN Subscribers: Rural Coverage: The Forgotten Opportunity
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Analysis of the size (geographic and dollar potential) for rural coverage solutions.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Analysis of the reasons why mobile operators have left rural coverage relatively untouched, in developed markets and also in developing countries.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: ORAN pRRU DRS DAS in-building IBW RU DU Open RAN
